product_name: LancomeGenifique Ultimate Face Serum & Eye Cream Skincare Gift Set
summary: SummaryLancôme Génifique Ultimate Skincare Gift Set with full & mini sizes of Génifique Ultimate Serum and mini Génifique Ultimate Eye Cream.
details: DetailsIncludesGénifique Ultimate Serum (0.7 oz)Génifique Ultimate Serum (0.3 oz)Génifique Eye Cream (0.2 oz)FeaturesGénifique Ultimate Recovery Face Serum reduces visible signs of skin damage in as soon as one week by targeting radiance, uneven skin tone, pores, fine lines, smoothness, and softness.Génifique Ultimate Eye Cream targets dark circles, puffiness, fine lines, and crow's feet to reveal a brighter, smoother eye areaResearch ResultsSerum: In a clinical test, results showed:93% better skin barrier repair in 1 hour95% of women had visibly reduced fine lines97% of women had smoother-feeling skinEye Cream: In a clinical study with 46 women (ages 45 to 75), after 8 weeks, results showed:100% saw improved dark circlesAfter 1 Week:98% agree product easily absorbs and eye feels comfortable94% agree eye area is moisturized and hydrated92% agree eye area looks smootherItem 2645202How To UseAfter cleansing and toning, apply Génifique Ultimate first before other serums. Dab several small pearls of Génifique Ultimate Eye Cream to the under eye and brow bone and gently massage.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing and toning, apply Génifique Ultimate first before other serums. Dab several small pearls of Génifique Ultimate Eye Cream to the under eye and brow bone and gently massage.
